meanings.definition: A person who makes mistakes or errors.
meanings.sent1: Tommy is known as the king of fuckups in our class.
meanings.sent2: We all have our moments of being fuckups, but we learn from them.
meanings.sent3: The award for the biggest fuckups of the year goes to Tommy!
meanings.sent4: In a world of perfection, the fuckups stand out like colorful balloons.
meanings.sent5: The image of Tommy as a fuckups is forever etched in our minds.

meanings.definition: The act of making a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: The fuckups in the report were easily corrected.
meanings.sent2: We must own up to our fuckups and strive to do better next time.
meanings.sent3: The comedy of errors was filled with hilarious fuckups.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of never-ending fuckups, each one more painful than the last.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the tension of impending fuckups.
